format: JavaScript (ES6 module syntax with Lightning JS framework)
description: This file defines a RecipeCard component for a Lightning JS-based application, displaying recipe info such as title, time, difficulty, rating, tags, and favorite status. It supports user interactions like opening recipe details and toggling favorites, with accessibility roles and labels included.

classes.name: RecipeCard
classes.description: A Lightning Component subclass representing a focusable recipe card with interactive and accessible UI elements.

methods.name: setFocused
methods.description: Updates the component's focus state to toggle visual focus indicators.

methods.name: $open
methods.description: Navigates to the detailed view of the recipe using the router.

methods.name: $toggleFavorite
methods.description: Dispatches an action to toggle the favorite status of the recipe.
